text.tspan: Obesity in men vs obesity in women, 2014
The share of adult women and men defined as obese, measured as the percentage with a body mass index (BMI)
value>30.0. The BMI is a person's weight in kilograms divided by his or her height in metres squared.
Source: Prevalence of weight categories in males - NCDRisC (2017), Prevalence of weight categories in females - NCDRisC (2017)
